abilities.name: King's Tribute
abilities.description: Innate: Whenever an enemy dies near Trundle, he  heals for  2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6% (based on level) of their maximum health.
descriptions: Innate: Whenever an enemy dies near Trundle, he  heals for  2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 6% (based on level) of their maximum health.

abilities.name: Chomp
abilities.description: Active: Trundle's next basic attack becomes  unstoppable, deals bonus physical damage and  slows the target by 75% for 0.1 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Trundle's next basic attack becomes  unstoppable, deals bonus physical damage and  slows the target by 75% for 0.1 seconds.
After biting his target, Trundle gains  bonus attack damage for 5 seconds and reduces his target's attack damage by half that amount for the same duration.
Chomp  resets Trundle's basic attack timer.

abilities.name: Frozen Domain
abilities.description: Active: Trundle coats the target area in ice for 8 seconds. While inside, he gains  bonus attack speed,  bonus movement speed, and 25% increased  healing from all sources.
abilities.leveling:
Bonus Attack Speed:20 / 40 / 60 / 80 / 100%
Bonus Movement Speed:20 / 28 / 36 / 44 / 52%
levelings:
Bonus Attack Speed:20 / 40 / 60 / 80 / 100%
Bonus Movement Speed:20 / 28 / 36 / 44 / 52%
descriptions: Active: Trundle coats the target area in ice for 8 seconds. While inside, he gains  bonus attack speed,  bonus movement speed, and 25% increased  healing from all sources.

abilities.name: Pillar of Ice
abilities.description: Active: Trundle projects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds,  knocking back all units directly over it 225 units on cast, acting as impassable terrain for the duration and  slowing enemies around it.
descriptions: Active: Trundle projects a pillar of ice at the target location for 6 seconds,  knocking back all units directly over it 225 units on cast, acting as impassable terrain for the duration and  slowing enemies around it.

abilities.name: Subjugate
abilities.description: Active: Trundle starts draining the life force out of the target enemy  champion,  healing for a percentage of their maximum health, dealing the same amount as magic damage, stealing 40% of their  armor and  magic resistance, and increasing in size by 18% as well as reducing his target's size by 9.9%. Half of the total damage and stealing is applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has  died.
abilities.leveling: Total Magic Damage:»20 / 23.75 / 27.5 / 31.25 / 35% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health«Initial Magic Damage:»10 / 11.875 / 13.75 / 15.625 / 17.5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health«Magic Damage Per Second:2.5 / 2.96875 / 3.4375 / 3.90625 / 4.375% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health
levelings: Total Magic Damage:»20 / 23.75 / 27.5 / 31.25 / 35% (+ 2% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health«Initial Magic Damage:»10 / 11.875 / 13.75 / 15.625 / 17.5% (+ 1% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health«Magic Damage Per Second:2.5 / 2.96875 / 3.4375 / 3.90625 / 4.375% (+ 0.25% per 100 AP) of the target's maximum health
descriptions: Active: Trundle starts draining the life force out of the target enemy  champion,  healing for a percentage of their maximum health, dealing the same amount as magic damage, stealing 40% of their  armor and  magic resistance, and increasing in size by 18% as well as reducing his target's size by 9.9%. Half of the total damage and stealing is applied instantly, and the other half, as well as the size modifiers, are applied over the next 4 seconds, even if the target has  died.
The armor and magic resistance will remain stolen for 4 seconds after the drain has ended.

name: Trundle
title: the Troll King
blurb: Trundle is a hulking and devious troll with a particularly vicious streak, and there is nothing he cannot bludgeon into submission—not even the Freljord itself. Fiercely territorial, he chases down anyone foolish enough to enter his domain. Then, his...
